sentences.en: ...a Bronco with its brights on, parked in the middle of the street.
sentences.cn: …一辆烈马牌的汽车打着开到最亮的头灯，停在街中央。

sentences.en: A bright shooting star, or meteor, is an unforgettable sight.
sentences.cn: 明亮的流星，或者说陨石，是番难忘的景象。

sentences.en: a large bright room
sentences.cn: 明亮的大房间

sentences.en: Both had successful careers and the future looked bright.
sentences.cn: 两个人都事业有成，前程似锦。

sentences.en: bright sunshine
sentences.cn: 灿烂的阳光

sentences.en: Each room is distinctively decorated with light, bright colors and floral prints.
sentences.cn: 每个房间都以淡雅或鲜艳的颜色和印花图案装饰成独特的风格。

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights flickered, and then the room was brilliantly, blindingly bright.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯闪了几下，接着屋子里豁然大亮，刺得人睁不开眼。

sentences.en: Ford had the bright idea of paying workers enough to buy cars.
sentences.cn: 福特公司想出了一绝妙的主意：付给工人足够的薪水去购买汽车。

sentences.en: He had fuzzy black hair and bright black eyes.
sentences.cn: 他一头柔软卷曲的黑发，眼睛又黑又亮。

sentences.en: He was a nice lad — bright and with a sunny disposition.
sentences.cn: 他是个不错的小伙子——聪明伶俐而且性格开朗。

sentences.en: He was an exceptionally bright child.
sentences.cn: 他是个特别聪明的孩子。

sentences.en: He was diagnosed as severely dyslexic but extraordinarily bright.
sentences.cn: 他被诊断患有严重的阅读困难症，但是却绝顶聪明。

sentences.en: He wore a T-shirt that had been tie-dyed in bright colours.
sentences.cn: 他身穿一件颜色鲜艳的扎染的T恤。

sentences.en: Her eyes were hurting from the bright lights.
sentences.cn: 明亮的光线刺痛了她的眼睛。

sentences.en: I came into contact with very bright Harvard and Yale students.
sentences.cn: 我接触到一些非常聪明的哈佛和耶鲁的学生。

sentences.en: She gave him a bright, determined smile which seemed unnatural.
sentences.cn: 她对他开朗、坚定地一笑，但笑得有点不自然。

sentences.en: Susan'sa very bright and intelligent woman who knows her own mind.
sentences.cn: 苏珊是个非常聪明、有主见的女子。

sentences.en: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females.
sentences.cn: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

sentences.en: The flowers are bronzy in bud and bright yellow when open.
sentences.cn: 这些花的花蕾是青铜色，开放后呈明黄色。

sentences.en: they hankered for the bright lights of the capital.
sentences.cn: 他们向往声色犬马的都市生活。

sentences.en: You're a bright enough kid, I'll give you that.
sentences.cn: 我得承认，你是个挺聪明的孩子。

words.tran_cn: [光][天] 亮度；聪明，活泼；鲜艳；愉快
明亮；变亮；活跃；快乐高兴
使闪亮；使生辉；使快乐高兴

phrases.tran_cn: 光明的未来，光明的前途
光明的前景，辉煌的前程
光明的一面；光泽面；令人高兴的一面
（在困境中）看局势的光明面，抱乐观态度

trans.tran_cn: 明亮的，鲜艳的，晴朗的，欢快的，聪明的，有希望的
trans.tran_en: shining strongly, or with plenty of light
The brights on a vehicle are its headlights when they are set to shine their brightest
